notes: Lord of the Elements is a boss that only can be seen in [[The Elemental Spheres Quest]]. Curiously, despite being the supposed "master" of all elements, it does not dare walk over [[Fire Field]]s unless provoked. You can skin a slain Lord of the Elements using an [[Obsidian Knife]] to obtain [[Neutral Matter]], with no chance of failure.
abilities: {{Ability List|{{Melee|0-350+}}|{{Summon|Massive Earth Elemental|2|Massive Fire Elemental|Massive Water Elemental|Massive Energy Elemental}}|{{Ability|Paralyzing [[Stone Shower]]||slowed}}|{{Outfit|no|Massive Earth Elemental||Massive Fire Elemental|Massive Water Elemental|Massive Energy Elemental}}}}
sounds: I'LL FREEZE YOU THEN I CRUSH YOU!
name: Lord of the Elements
behaviour: This creature retargets all the time and can easily kill the mages. Also, it's very fast.
strategy:
Since you need one character of each vocation for this monster you will have to work as a team.
Make sure that the [[knight]] blocks him. The mages should focus on doing spell damage while the [[paladin]] shoots at him with his ammunition. make sure that the druid heals the knight since the boss can do quite some damage from time to time.
